items.content_html: currency-in-word is a lightweight npm library that converts numerical currency values into their corresponding word representations. It's useful for generating invoices, legal documents, or any scenario where a textual representation of currency is required.
items.title: proquotation/currency-in-word: currency-in-word is a lightweight npm library that converts numerical currency values into their corresponding word representations. It's useful for generating invoices, legal documents, or any scenario where a textual representation of currency is required.

items.content_html: A lightweight and performant logging module for Node.js applications, available as an NPM package. It supports console and file logging with multiple levels and colors, and includes additional features such as memory usage tracking, caller information, and configurable output formats.
items.title: samestrin/advanced-console-log: A lightweight and performant logging module for Node.js applications, available as an NPM package. It supports console and file logging with multiple levels and colors, and includes additional features such as memory usage tracking, caller information, and configurable output formats.

items.content_html: ArmCord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
items.title: Heiko-Lemmert/join-project: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
